intro: Alkanna pulmonaria, commonly known as the lungwort, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun to partial shade, making it a suitable candidate for rock gardens and dry landscapes. Alkanna pulmonaria is also valued for its ornamental appeal and historical use in traditional medicine.
